alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:56PM MDT until June 27 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 356 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rapid Valley around 400 PM MDT. Ellsworth Air Force Base and Box Elder around 410 PM MDT. Rapid City Airport around 415 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include New Underwood. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 54 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
